import "./style.css"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Layout, Card, Input, Col, Row, Button, Typography } from "antd"; import { Form, Space } from "antd"; const { Content } = Layout; const { Title, Text } = Typography; const formItemLayout = { labelCol: { xs: { span: 24, }, sm: { span: 8, }, }, wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 24, }, sm: { span: 16, }, }, }; const tailFormItemLayout = { wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 24, offset: 0, }, sm: { span: 16, offset: 8, }, }, }; const ThongTinHD = () => { const [form] = Form.useForm(); const onFinish = (values) => { console.log("Received values of form: ", values); }; return (

); }; export default ThongTinHD;
